Name: Ciprofloxacin
Commonly Used For: Urinary tract and other bacterial infections

Name: Ranitidine
Commonly Used For: Acid reflux (Note: Recalled in many countries)

Name: Enoxaparin
Commonly Used For: DVT and PE prevention and treatment

Name: Clopidogrel
Commonly Used For: Prevent blood clots after MI or stroke

Name: Finasteride
Commonly Used For: Benign prostatic hyperplasia and hair loss
